longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Enjoy 58 tracks in MP3 and FLAC format from KARMA: The Dark World
<!--text-->
This soundtrack is a journey through two intertwined worlds, each defined by its unique sonic identity and its role in the narrative tapestry of our game. Here, music isn’t just an accompaniment- it is the heartbeat of the story.

On one side, you'll find melodies that evoke the tangible, human experience of the physical

world. Acoustic textures and organic instrumentation ground the listener in a space of familiarity and warmth. These sounds reflect the nuances of everyday life, echoing the natural rhythms and heartfelt emotions that define our physical existence.

In stark contrast lies the realm of the spirit — a distorted, otherworldly dimension where

conventional harmony gives way to dissonant, electronic landscapes. This is a world of mystery and dread, where eerie motifs and unsettling beats mirror the terror and chaos that lurk beneath the surface of our perceived reality.
